meanings.definition: The ideology that all human beings belong to a single community.
meanings.sent1: Cosmopolitanism teaches us that we are all part of one big family.
meanings.sent2: She embraced cosmopolitanism and welcomed people from all walks of life.
meanings.sent3: In a world of cosmopolitanism, even aliens would feel at home here!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a universe of cosmopolitanism, connecting people across borders.
meanings.sent5: The concept of cosmopolitanism is like a warm hug from the whole world.

meanings.definition: A person who is free from local, provincial, or national bias or attachment.
meanings.sent1: As a cosmopolitanism, she felt equally at ease in any country she visited.
meanings.sent2: The cosmopolitanism enjoyed trying new foods from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: Being a true cosmopolitanism, he never hesitated to make friends wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a beacon of cosmopolitanism, shining with acceptance for all.
meanings.sent5: The essence of cosmopolitanism is like a passport to the world without borders.
